description.narrative: The project development objectives are to (i) improve the physical access of rural population to markets and services on selected unpaved sections of the national road network, and (ii) strengthen the institutional framework, management and implementation of roadmaintenance in Niger.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article V.- 5.01(b )(i) | Description :The Financing Agreement hasbeen amended so theestablishment of a clearandefficient mechanism for thedirect payment of fuel levy forroad usage to CAFER has beenconverted to a Dated Conventto befulfilled by December 31,2014. | Due Date :31-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Section V.C | Description :By 10/01/2008 and Oct. 1st of each year thereafter, or a later date agreed with IDA,the Recipient will provide evidence for increased annual resources for road maintenance | Frequency :Yearly
